variables.input:
fetch dt.entity.cloud_application_namespace
| fields entity.name
| dedup entity.name
| append [data record(entity.name="<local>")]

fetch logs
| fields loglevel
| filterOut loglevel == "NONE"
| sort loglevel asc
| summarize distinctLoglevels = collectDistinct(loglevel)

0.title: Total Search Count
0.query:
fetch logs
// filter by the namespace or set the filter to <local> if running demo locally
| filter  ($KubernetesMode!="<local>" and k8s.namespace.name == $KubernetesMode)
  or ($KubernetesMode=="<local>" and isNull(k8s.namespace.name))
| filter matchesPhrase(content, "gpt-3.5") or matchesPhrase(content, "text-embedding-ada-002")
| makeTimeseries count()

1.title: Total
1.query:
fetch logs
// filter by the namespace or set the filter to <local> if running demo locally
| filter  ($KubernetesMode!="<local>" and k8s.namespace.name == $KubernetesMode)
  or ($KubernetesMode=="<local>" and isNull(k8s.namespace.name))
| filter matchesPhrase(content, "gpt-3.5") or matchesPhrase(content, "text-embedding-ada-002")
| summarize count()

2.title: Cache Hit Rate
2.query:
fetch logs
// filter by the namespace or set the filter to <local> if running demo locally
| filter  ($KubernetesMode!="<local>" and k8s.namespace.name == $KubernetesMode)
  or ($KubernetesMode=="<local>" and isNull(k8s.namespace.name))
| summarize genCount = toDouble(countIf(matchesPhrase(content, "gpt-3.5"))),
            vecEmbeddingCount = toDouble(countIf(matchesPhrase(content, "text-embedding-ada-002")))
| fieldsAdd totalCount = genCount + vecEmbeddingCount
| fieldsAdd cacheHitRate = vecEmbeddingCount / totalCount * 100
| fieldsKeep cacheHitRate

4.title: Generations
4.query:
fetch logs
// filter by the namespace or set the filter to <local> if running demo locally
| filter  ($KubernetesMode!="<local>" and k8s.namespace.name == $KubernetesMode)
  or ($KubernetesMode=="<local>" and isNull(k8s.namespace.name))
| filter matchesPhrase(content, "gpt-3.5") 
| summarize count()

5.title: Vectors
5.query:
fetch logs
// filter by the namespace or set the filter to <local> if running demo locally
| filter  ($KubernetesMode!="<local>" and k8s.namespace.name == $KubernetesMode)
  or ($KubernetesMode=="<local>" and isNull(k8s.namespace.name))
| filter matchesPhrase(content, "text-embedding-ada-002")
| summarize count()

6.content:
### Semantic Cache Quick View
See also dedicated Weaviate dashboards for deeper statistics

8.title: Prompt Token Count
8.query:
fetch logs
// filter by the namespace or set the filter to <local> if running demo locally
| filter  ($KubernetesMode!="<local>" and k8s.namespace.name == $KubernetesMode)
  or ($KubernetesMode=="<local>" and isNull(k8s.namespace.name))
| filter matchesPhrase(content, "gpt-3.5")
| parse content, "LD 'prompt_tokens=' INT:promptTokens"
| parse content, "LD 'completion_tokens=' INT:completionTokens"
| parse content, "LD 'model=' STRING:llmModel"
| summarize promptTokensCount = sum(promptTokens)

9.title: Completion Token Count
9.query:
fetch logs
| filter  ($KubernetesMode!="<local>" and k8s.namespace.name == $KubernetesMode)
  or ($KubernetesMode=="<local>" and isNull(k8s.namespace.name))
| filter matchesPhrase(content, "gpt-3.5") 
| parse content, "LD 'prompt_tokens=' INT:promptTokens"
| parse content, "LD 'completion_tokens=' INT:completionTokens"
| parse content, "LD 'model=' STRING:llmModel"
| summarize completionTokensCount = sum(completionTokens)

11.title: Costs
11.query:
fetch logs
// filter by the namespace or set the filter to <local> if running demo locally
| filter  ($KubernetesMode!="<local>" and k8s.namespace.name == $KubernetesMode)
  or ($KubernetesMode=="<local>" and isNull(k8s.namespace.name))
| filter matchesPhrase(content, "gpt-3.5") 
| parse content, "LD 'prompt_tokens=' INT:promptTokens"
| parse content, "LD 'completion_tokens=' INT:completionTokens"
| parse content, "LD 'model=' STRING:llmModel"
| summarize cost = (sum(promptTokens) / 1000.0 * 0.0010) + (sum(completionTokens) / 1000.0 * 0.0020)

12.title: Costs
12.query:
fetch logs
// filter by the namespace or set the filter to <local> if running demo locally
| filter  ($KubernetesMode!="<local>" and k8s.namespace.name == $KubernetesMode)
  or ($KubernetesMode=="<local>" and isNull(k8s.namespace.name))
| filter matchesPhrase(content, "text-embedding-ada-002")
| parse content, "LD 'prompt_tokens=' INT:promptTokens"
| parse content, "LD 'completion_tokens=' INT:completionTokens"
| parse content, "LD 'model=' STRING:llmModel"
| summarize cost = (sum(promptTokens) / 1000.0 * 0.0001)

13.title: Cache Saving
13.query:
fetch logs
// filter by the namespace or set the filter to <local> if running demo locally
| filter  ($KubernetesMode!="<local>" and k8s.namespace.name == $KubernetesMode)
  or ($KubernetesMode=="<local>" and isNull(k8s.namespace.name))
| parse content, "LD 'prompt_tokens=' INT:promptTokens"
| parse content, "LD 'completion_tokens=' INT:completionTokens"
| parse content, "LD 'model=' STRING:llmModel"
| summarize genCount = countIf(matchesPhrase(content, "gpt-3.5")),
            vecEmbeddingCount = countIf(matchesPhrase(content, "text-embedding-ada-002")),
            sumCompletions = sum(completionTokens),
            sumPrompts = sum(promptTokens)
| fieldsAdd cacheSaving = sumCompletions / genCount * vecEmbeddingCount / 1000 * 0.0020
| fieldsKeep cacheSaving

15.title: Search Volume by Prompt

16.title: Total Search Count
16.query:
fetch logs
// filter by the namespace or set the filter to <local> if running demo locally
| filter  ($KubernetesMode!="<local>" and k8s.namespace.name == $KubernetesMode)
  or ($KubernetesMode=="<local>" and isNull(k8s.namespace.name))
| filter matchesPhrase(content, "gpt-3.5") or matchesPhrase(content, "text-embedding-ada-002")
| fieldsKeep content
| summarize count()
//| makeTimeseries count()
